alert.note: Alert for Irion; Schleicher; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 12:06AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Schleicher, southeastern Tom Green and southeastern Irion Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1206 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Knickerbocker, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Angelo, Mertzon, Christoval, Wall, Knickerbocker, Twin Buttes Reservoir, Lake Nasworthy, Tankersley, Sherwood and Us- 67 Near The Irion-Tom Green County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
